name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: URL Rabbit - Hop Over URL Fragments

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used to take the current Tab's URL and break into components of the URL structure

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Many times, as a developer, you want to be able to break the URL into fragments in which you may change the values of the parameters, query parameters, and other values.

With URL Rabbit, now you can do it easily with just a click away!
